skills.name: WILD BLOW
desc: • 35% Chance to Disable Passive for 2 turns.
• 35% Chance to gain 100% Critical Strike chance for 2 turns.

skills.name: CHARGE
desc: • Grants Charge to all allies for 1 turn.
• Charge increases the damage of the next attack by 80%.

skills.name: ISOLATE
desc: Removes beneficial effects, including Golden Effects, from up to 2 enemies every turn.
